column1: The previous arthropods may seem pretty harmless or
column3: we may think they are pests. because they are annoying. But spiders tend to create a lot of fear in people. This is due to the fact that almost all spiders are venomous
column4: and some have large enough fangs to bite humans. However
column8: and are beneficial as predators of pests and parasites This is good news
column9: because in our study we found that two families of spiders
column11: were found in 100 and 84% of homes
column13: we found evidence of cobweb spiders in 65% of the rooms we sampled. Spiders are very good at surviving for long periods of time without food and can live in the less-than-ideal environment that houses provide. Spiders are not the only predators to become accustomed to homes. House centipedes
column14: or "thousand-leggers" may be even more terrifying to people. These many-legged arthropods can thrive indoors where the humidity is right.
